subject: Kayaks
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Birgit Fischer, a kayaker who won eight Olympic gold medals, will skip the Beijing Games because she has not trained enough. Fischer, a 45-year-old German, has competed at six Olympics. She also has four silver medals from the Olympics and 27 world championship titles.
